title: Students in Berlin
brief_description: Shows the Free University of West Berlin and students from all over the world in part-time jobs in the city and at their studies. The history of the Free University, from its establishment by the students themselves to its present prosperous condition, with many fine buildings, numerous research institutes and large self-governing student body.
